name: Four Color Puzzle
description:
In this chill puzzle game experience, click to set the colors of the regions to find a solution where no two adjacent pieces have the same color. Complete 35 handmade levels, or explore infinite randomly generated 3D puzzles.

Four colors are always enough to color the regions of a map so that no two adjacent regions have the same color. You just need to find the way to do it!

Features:
  • Full 3D graphics
  • 2D and 3D puzzles
  • 35 handmade levels
  • Every level completed unlocks a new cosmetic color scheme
  • Random generation mode for infinite puzzle generation
